name: The Secret in the Mirror
description:
Strange goings on in an unfamiliar town, from missing people to lost memories, and mysterious dungeons that re-arrange themselves. Can you get to the bottom of the secret in the mirror?

An RPG with a combination of randomly generated roguelike dungeons and preset puzzle dungeons.

Controls: Mouse in combination with arrow keys to move, and z, x, a & s keys as action buttons.
